statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 9 \\ -11 \\ 2 \\ 16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
